name: saxes
description: An evented streaming XML parser in JavaScript

scripts.copy: cp -p README.md build/dist && sed -e'/"private": true/d' package.json > build/dist/package.json
scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run copy
scripts.gh-pages: npm run build-docs && mkdir -p build && (cd build; rm -rf gh-pages; git clone .. --branch gh-pages gh-pages) && mkdir -p build/gh-pages/latest && find build/gh-pages/latest -type f -delete && cp -rp build/docs/* build/gh-pages/latest && find build/gh-pages -type d -empty -delete
scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: npm run test && npm run self:publish
